import json

# Read the policy file
with open(''data/policy.v1.json'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8'') as f:
    policy = json.load(f)

# Find the Utilities sector
for sector in policy[''sectors'']:
    if sector[''name''] == ''Utilities'':
        # Update blocked and warning
        sector[''blocked''] = False
        sector[''warning''] = True
        # Update notes
        sector[''notes''] = ''Zero profitable strategies across tests. Only trade strong directional moves or obvious range-bound edges.''
        # Add strategy_suitability
        sector[''strategy_suitability''] = {
            ''Alt10'': {
                ''rating'': ''incompatible'',
                ''color'': ''red'',
                ''rationale'': ''Utilities -12.4% with Alt10 (mean-reverting sector incompatible with profit targets)'',
                ''require_acknowledgement'': True
            },
            ''Alt46'': {
                ''rating'': ''incompatible'',
                ''color'': ''red'',
                ''rationale'': ''Utilities -6.2% with Alt46 (sector-adaptive cannot fix mean-reversion)'',
                ''require_acknowledgement'': True
            },
            ''Alt26'': {
                ''rating'': ''incompatible'',
                ''color'': ''red'',
                ''rationale'': ''Utilities -8.9% with Alt26 (fractional pyramid fails on whipsaws)'',
                ''require_acknowledgement'': True
            },
            ''Baseline'': {
                ''rating'': ''incompatible'',
                ''color'': ''red'',
                ''rationale'': ''Turtle Core trend-following catastrophic in mean-reverting utilities'',
                ''require_acknowledgement'': True
            },
            ''Alt22'': {
                ''rating'': ''incompatible'',
                ''color'': ''red'',
                ''rationale'': ''Parabolic SAR generates excessive whipsaws in utilities (0% success)'',
                ''require_acknowledgement'': True
            },
            ''Alt28'': {
                ''rating'': ''incompatible'',
                ''color'': ''red'',
                ''rationale'': ''ADX filter cannot fix fundamental utilities mean-reversion (0% success)'',
                ''require_acknowledgement'': True
            },
            ''Alt43'': {
                ''rating'': ''incompatible'',
                ''color'': ''red'',
                ''rationale'': ''Volatility-adaptive targets fail on utilities whipsaws (0% success)'',
                ''require_acknowledgement'': True
            },
            ''Alt47'': {
                ''rating'': ''incompatible'',
                ''color'': ''red'',
                ''rationale'': ''Momentum-scaled sizing useless in non-trending utilities (0% success)'',
                ''require_acknowledgement'': True
            },
            ''Alt45'': {
                ''rating'': ''incompatible'',
                ''color'': ''red'',
                ''rationale'': ''Dual-momentum confirmation weak in utilities (0% success)'',
                ''require_acknowledgement'': True
            },
            ''Alt9'': {
                ''rating'': ''incompatible'',
                ''color'': ''red'',
                ''rationale'': ''Time exit catastrophic on utilities (0% success)'',
                ''require_acknowledgement'': True
            },
            ''Alt39'': {
                ''rating'': ''incompatible'',
                ''color'': ''red'',
                ''rationale'': ''Age-based targets fail in mean-reverting utilities (0% success)'',
                ''require_acknowledgement'': True
            }
        }
        # Add utilities_warning
        sector[''utilities_warning''] = {
            ''title'': ''⚠️ Utilities Sector Warning'',
            ''message'': ''We have ZERO successful backtests with Utilities. This sector is mean-reverting and unsuitable for trend-following strategies. Historical data shows consistent losses across all tested strategies:\n\n• Alt10 (Profit Targets): -12.4%\n• Alt46 (Sector-Adaptive): -6.2%\n• Alt26 (Fractional Pyramid): -8.9%\n• All other strategies: 0% success rate\n\nONLY TRADE if you identify:\n✓ Strong, sustained uptrend (above SMA200 for 3+ months)\n✓ Strong, sustained downtrend (below SMA200 for 3+ months)\n✓ Obvious range-bound pattern at clear support/resistance levels\n\nProceed with extreme caution and tight risk management.'',
            ''acknowledgement_text'': ''I understand Utilities has 0% backtest success and will only trade clear directional moves or range edges with tight risk management.''
        }
        break

# Write the updated policy back
with open(''data/policy.v1.json'', ''w'', encoding=''utf-8'') as f:
    json.dump(policy, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False)

print(''✅ Updated Utilities sector with strategy_suitability and utilities_warning'')
")
